attributes.action: Make it illegal to exclusively lockdown, segregate or exclude the unvaccinated.
attributes.additional_details:
Such measures might amount to an abuse of human rights and would only serve to punish or coerce the unvaccinated; as opposed to being a reasonable ‘public health measure’. Therefore, any action of this nature should be outlawed.

https://news.sky.com/story/covid-19-absolutely-nothing-to-indicate-new-lockdown-is-needed-says-boris-johnson-but-all-measures-under-constant-review-12441386
attributes.background: In an interview with Sky News on or around 22 October 2021, Boris Johnson stated that the double vaccination “…doesn’t protect you against catching the disease and it doesn’t protect you against passing it on”. It is therefore illogical to lockdown or exclude the unvaccinated as seen in Austria etc.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

Stop discriminating against the unvaccinated in Covid 19 policy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239
